name: Doctor Anesthesia
description:
Most REALISTIC medical game for anesthesiology!

Doctor Anesthesia is a medical puzzle game where you play a clueless anesthesiologist. Your job is to figure out the checklist a real anesthesiologist uses and then perform full general anesthesia using the checklist to win the game!

- Experiment to discover the checklist contents!

- Perform full anesthesia before the time runs out!

Android link:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.godotengine.narcosisalpha
